Program Description: Rebate for 50% of project costs up to $400 for a Cold Climate Ductless (Mini-Split) Air Source Heat Pump
Bonus Description: *Additional $100 rebate if replacing a gas furnace or boiler with an air or ground source heat pump. Requires proof of removal
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
*HSPF ≥10.0/SEER≥15.0/COP ≥ 1.75@5◦F or capacity @ 5◦F of at least 70% of BTU @ 47◦F .
*Must be NEEP.org certified.
*For air source heat pump (ASHPs) a thermostatic expansion valve within the appliance is required.
Other Restrictions:
*Rebates are available to EnergySmart participants residing in Boulder County (sign up here). 
*In order to receive a rebate residents must work with an EnergySmart advisor and pre-qualify before making a purchase or beginning a project.
*To get started, contact an EnergySmart advisor at 303-544-1000 or email info@EnergySmartYes.com. 
*Rebates cannot exceed the cost of the measure after all other rebates are applied
*All work must be completed and invoiced between January 1, 2023 and December 31, 2023 to qualify for these rebates
Stacking Details: *Total lifetime maximum of all heat pump, weatherization, water heater, and stove rebates cannot exceed $1,800/home and $6,000/owner of multiple properties (including past EnergySmart rebates).
